testSteps.description: Then response status code should be 200
And response body json schema is "register.json"

exception.message:
1 expectation failed.
Response body doesn't match expectation.
Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema.
error: object has missing required properties (["id","token"])
    level: "error"
    schema: {"loadingURI":"file:/C:/Users/Lenovo/qebatch4/RestAssuredDemo/target/test-classes/schema/register.json#","pointer":""}
    instance: {"pointer":""}
    domain: "validation"
    keyword: "required"
    required: ["id","token"]
    missing: ["id","token"]

  Actual: {"email":"eve.holt@reqres.in","password":"pistol","updatedAt":"2022-06-19T18:13:19.032Z"}
